segments.text: Why don't you sit down and relax , darling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , come over and talk to me then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I turn on the TV then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Turn on the TV for what ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So that we can sit down together and listen to some music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Listen to the music ? And who will cook dinner , will you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will , but let's go to the disco after dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To a disco ? Oh , no . You know I hate it .
segments.speaker: S2
